body:
Thanks, James.  This is a big help.  I'm especially grateful for the  
context diffs on the Rmakefile's, which I've checked in.  Different  
systems put different things in the math library.  I suspect that  
Solaris puts atof() there, which is why it's needed most of the time.


I will include your Solaris binaries when I post the 3.9 release.


-Greg
___
